item.title: Alison Brie Says the ‘Problem With the Current Era’ of ‘Scream’ Is That ‘Too Many People Live’: ‘The Core Four Needs to Die’
item.description: Alison Brie has some notes for the franchise if she’s going to return for “Scream 7.” In a recent podcast episode of “Shut Up Evan,” Brie shared how she recently pitched
